eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}
\label{eq2.1} 
{\bf \Gamma}&\rightarrow&e^{i\Lambda({\bf X})}{\bf \Gamma},\no
T({\bf X})&\rightarrow& e^{i\Lambda({\bf X})}T({\bf X}),\no
A^{(-)}_{\mu}({\bf X})&\rightarrow& A^{(-)}_{\mu}({\bf X})
+\pa_{\mu}\Lambda({\bf X}),\no
A^{(+)}_{\mu}({\bf X})&\rightarrow& A^{(+)}_{\mu}({\bf X})
+\pa_{\mu}\Lambda^{\prime}({\bf X}).
\
